before.title: Obama's 2009 Inauguration
before.alt: High angle photo of Obama's 2009 Inauguration with large crowds of humans

after.title: Trump's 2017 Inauguration
after.alt: High angle photo of Trump's 2017 Inauguration with large empty areas

caption: 2009, left, at President Obama’s first inauguration on the Mall in Washington. 2017, right, the image of President Trump’s inauguration. (National Park Service)
